name: The Button (WIP - V0.003)
description:
"The Button" is an "In-Development" Idle/Incremental Clicker game. The premise is to click the button and as you click it more and more, the game rewards you with more epic stuff, that allow you to get more from each click. The game also offers a way to purchase "Auto-Clickers" that automatically get you clicks over time. I am working as much as I can to ensure this game stays enjoyable for all. As a solo developer, it may take some time, but I am open to any opinions or ideas you think I should add in future updates!
